document_data.name: Speedmount
document_data.mainbody: '''''Speedmount''''' was an [[alteration]] [[spell]] that increased the speed of a single [[horse]], or other animal that was ridden as a mount.
document_data.Effects: For the duration of the spell, the affected creature could move at the twice the rate it was typically capable. The duration of ''speedmount'' was a matter of seconds, but increased depending on the skill and experience of the caster.
document_data.Usage: This spell was somewhat unique to the [[elves]] of [[Evermeet]]. The specifications of its casting were a well-kept secret of island realm.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required the use of a single horseshoe.
